Package event

Class UpdateEvent

java.lang.Object
java.util.EventObject
event.UpdateEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UpdateEvent extends EventObject
Class that represents an event which Publisher sends its Observer when Publisher.notifyObservers() is called.
